name: More Isles
description:
[Better experience with Windows executable]

The waters are rising.
An islander proverb says :

- Less place is more people to feed.

Another one says :

- Less land is higher land.

Organize and assemble your resources to rescue all the refugees on your island.

This game was originally created for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 (2021)

with the theme : "Less is more".

Controls:
  • Right mouse click to move the camera
  • Left and right mouse click to rotate the camera
Rules precisions: Bubble numbers :
  •  Red bubble indicate Food loss
  •  Green bubble indicate Food gain
  •  Yellow bubble indicates the overall Food gain/loss
Possible Merges:

Merge to identical tiles gives the level 2 version of the tile

Credits :
  • Programming and Game Design : Frelude
  • Graphics, Sound Design, Music : Madélou
